revised_title: Dynamic Response of an Elastic Half-Space to Time-Dependent Surface Traction Over an Embedded Spherical Cavity: Special Case of Uniform Normal Pressure
tldr: The authors examine the effect of a liquid layer overlying a solid half-space with an embedded spherical cavity, focusing on the Stoneley waves along the liquid/solid interface. They consider a special case of uniform normal pressure applied over the cavity surface and analyze the wave system generated by the primary disturbance. The study provides insights into the behavior of Stoneley waves and their travel paths in the liquid layer.
